pageContext.claim: “Now, even the letter written to the Times, there is a chance -- I don't say it's a big chance, but there is a very good chance -- that that was written by the Times.”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times made the unusual decision to publish an op-ed from a "senior administration official" criticizing Trump. Trump claims without evidence that the Times may have faked the whole thing and written the op-ed in house.
